attributes.action: make every minister, MP and people who make policy take a drop in pay to the average salary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If every minister, MP and the people who make policy take a drop in pay to the average salary they would then have first hand knowledge of the acts and policies they create. I realise that a lot of people in this position would have quite a bit of money anyway at first but they would soon leave for better pay. This would free up these positions for people who actually care about what they do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
